document_data.mainbody:
he Street of Glances was a road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
The Street of Glances was located in the northwest section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. It ran roughly east to west, originating on Westwall Street in the west and branching east to end at the Heroes Walk. The Street of Glances was intersected by Stormstars Ride, Morningstar Way, Gorl Street, Staghunters Way, Sighing Maidens Walk, Telchar Lane, Sniff Alley, the Skulkway, Ivory Street, the Street of Whispers, and the Street of the Singing Dolphin.
* Selchouns Sundries Shop
